title: No children nodes listed when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, no children nodes are listed.
EB: The expected result is that when the data source is changed, the children nodes of the new data source should be listed out.
SR:
1. Open the query tab in the data set editor.
2. Select a data set.
3. Click on the data source dropdown and choose a different data source.
4. Observe the children nodes listed for the new data source.
